subject: Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games (2016)
Track and Field
Whistle-Blowers
lead_paragraph: Vitaliy and Yuliya Stepanova, the Russian couple whose exposure of doping in their country led to Russian athletes’ being barred from international competition, told the German broadcaster ARD that the athletes should remain suspended.
snippet: Vitaliy and Yuliya Stepanova, the Russian couple whose exposure of doping in their country led to Russian athletes’ being barred from international competition, told the German broadcaster ARD that the athletes should remain suspended.
